definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: Mother likes to burn a stick of incense to drive away mosquitoes.
sentences.chinese: 客廳裏點上一支線香驅除蚊蟲。

definition: ritual money made of paper burnt for the Gods or the dead
to manufacture charcoal/to burn charcoal (often a reference to suicide by carbon monoxide poisoning)
to wash one's hands/(fig.) to go to the toilet
name of a famous Tang dynasty wine/same as 白酒[bai2 jiu3]
